 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָדַם‎</span>] **verb Niph\`al** ==be in, or fall into, heavy sleep== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***stop up*** (door, gap, etc.), whence perhaps ***be deaf*** (stopped up) to sounds, etc.); — ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִרְדַּם‎</span> [[Judg.4.21|Judg 4:21]] 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִרְדַּמְתִּי‎</span> [[Dan.8.8|Dan 8:8]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיֵּרָדֵם‎</span> [[Jonah.1.5|Jonah 1:5]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִרְדָּם‎</span> [[Prov.10.5|Prov 10:5]] + 3 t.; — ***be*** or ***fall fast asleep:*** [[Judg.4.21|Judg 4:21]]; [[Jonah.1.5|Jonah 1:5]] (after <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּשְׁכַב‎</span>), v[[Jonah.1.6|Jonah 1:6]] (participle, [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:120b»§ 120b</sup> [[BDB#Da|Da]]<sup>Synt. § 70</sup> (a)); participle as substantive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִרְדָּם בַּקָּצִיר‎</span> [[Prov.10.5|Prov 10:5]] of sleep of death [[Ps.76.7|Ps 76:7]] stunning effect of awe and dread [[Dan.8.18|Dan 8:18]]; [[Dan.10.9|Dan 10:9]] (both + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָ֑רְצָה‎</span> [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ וּפָנַי ‎</span>] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלפָּֿנַי‎</span>.
